post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
" Hey all players

Exe clan, FF clan, AoD clan are going to organise a dm cup. We are still thinking wich rules we are going to use and wich map and server. It will be a fight between the clans. It will be in teams but we don't know actually how many people in teams maybe 5. New informations will come in the following days. We are creating a logo and a little movie to present the cup. It will be done for the end of the week normally. So if people are interested in it they can write here just under this post. The cup will be around the month of june.

Hope to see you in the cup "

Official page of Exe Clan - "http://vk.com/wolf_exe"
